author: jefft
msg: Simplify and improve backcopy. Now any file that exists in src/documentation/*, and is more recent in build/webapp/*, will be backcopied

author: jefft
msg: Fix bug which allowed nested lists like <ol><ol>. Now lists can only contain li's.

author: jefft
msg: add @indexfile to tabs. We can't infer this from @href without breaking the selected-tab algorithm
